1011100011100100 1001110111000110 1 -> sum: 0101011010101011, cout: 1
0000011100110010 1000000010001101 1 -> sum: 1000011111000000, cout: 0

1110011000011101 0010010001001010 0 -> sum: 0000101001100111, cout: 1
1000001000000010 0110010000110110 1 -> sum: 1110011000111001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
